title: Hosting the Seventh Meeting of the SAARC Inter-Governmental Group on Transport
decision_details: - It had been decided at the 32nd Session of the Standing Committee held in the year 2006 to establish the SAARC Inter-Governmental Group on Transport at the Secretarial level of the Ministries. Through this, it is expected to strengthen diplomatic relations within the region and enhance regional cooperation. The 7th meeting of the Group is proposed to be held in Colombo on 20, 21-06-2025. Accordingly, the proposal made by the Minister of Transport, Highways, Ports and Civil Aviation for Sri Lanka to host the 7th Meeting of the SAARC Inter-Governmental Group on Transport, was approved by the Cabinet.
